movie_title: The Last Star in the Universe – Red Dwarfs Explained
introduction: The last star in the universe will be a red dwarf. Red dwarfs in general might be great places to lo

vocabulary.example: The extreme temperatures make the desert uninhabitable for most plants and animals.

vocabulary.definition: relating to or caused by convection (the movement caused within a fluid by the tendency of hotter and therefore less dense material to rise)
vocabulary.example: The convective currents in the atmosphere help distribute heat around the Earth.

vocabulary.definition: to cause a fire or light to stop burning or shining
vocabulary.example: The firefighter quickly extinguished the flames before they spread to the neighboring houses.

vocabulary.definition: an astronomical body's rotation period matches its orbital period around another body
vocabulary.example: The same side of the moon always faces the Earth due to being tidally locked.

vocabulary.definition: having lost the physical qualities that are typical of most living things, such as the ability to grow, change, and behave in a natural way
vocabulary.example: The polluted river caused the fish to become degenerate and die off.
The scientist's discovery of a new species was truly fascinating to the entire research community.
